title: Ticket #5995: Schedd crashes when crontab jobs runs during daylight  savings time
description:
If a condor crondor job is rescheduled, and the new instance needs to run during the hour that we "fell back" during the daylight saving time switch in the fall, the schedd will except.

I think similar problems with happen if the schedd is running in a VM, and the VM is suspended, or if the admin sets the clock backwards.

To fix this, we will re-run the cron job in the "gap hour", or if we think the clock has skipped backwards, then go back to the normal schedule.
